message.heading: Stand tall, boy. Have some respect for yourself. Don't you know, if you let people walk over you now, they'll be walking over you for the rest of your life. Look at me. You think I'm gonna spend the rest of my life in this slop house?

Veniam consequatur sed. Quos voluptas quisquam cumque et aliquam. Ullam sit rerum deleniti corrupti labore. Similique corrupti impedit.

message.heading: Okay, thank you. That's enough. Hold it now. Hold it. Hold it, fellas. I'm afraid you're just too darn loud. Next, please. Bring in the next group, please.
